titlepage.titleproper:
Finding Aid for
Dept. of History
(University of Michigan)
Senior Honors Theses, 1969-[ongoing]
titlepage.author:
Finding aid prepared by:
Thomas E. Powers, September 1992

origination.corpname: University of Michigan. Dept. of History.

did.unittitle: Dept. of History (University of Michigan) senior honors theses 1969-[ongoing]
did.physloc: Portions of the collection are stored offsite; two days notice required for retrieval.
did.abstract: Research papers on topics relating to Michigan history and the history of the University of Michigan written by students in the History Department Undergraduate Honors Program.

repository.corpname: Bentley Historical Library University of Michigan

acqinfo.p: This collection was transferred from the History Department (donor no. 1442) in 1990. Periodic additions are expected.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research with the exception of several theses for which student release forms are not on file. In compliance with the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act, theses without release forms are closed for 75 years.

userestrict.p: Authors of individual papers retain copyright.

prefercite.p: item, folder title, box no., Dept. of History (University of Michigan) Senior Honors Theses, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

bioghist.p: This is a collection of senior honors theses written by University of Michigan students in the department of history. Only topics relating to the history of Michigan or the history of the University of Michigan have been retained in this collection.

arrangement.p: The papers are organized by year of completion and thereunder alphabetically by author.
